name: Liliana Willow

background.name: Acolyte
background.description: You have spent your life in the service of a temple to a specific god or pantheon of gods. You act as an intermediary between the realm of the holy and the mortal world, performing sacred rites and offering sacrifices.

personalityTraits: I can find common ground between the fiercest enemies, empathizing with them and always working toward peace.
I see omens in every event and action. The gods try to speak to us, we just need to listen.
ideal: Charity. I always try to help those in need, no matter what the personal cost.
bond: I will do anything to protect the temple where I served.
flaw: I trust too easily, which can lead me into trouble.
backstory: Raised in the tranquil groves of my homeland, I was chosen at a young age to serve in the grand temple. My devotion to my deities drives me to seek knowledge and spread the light of wisdom.
